function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases in the community","Mitigation":"Provide public health support and education to increase community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Community members, travelers, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Risk of uncontrolled mass travel during holidays","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to mass movement of people","Mitigation":"Improve public health communication and support for self-quarantine measures, implement travel restrictions and regulations","Technologies":"Air travel monitoring systems, travel history databases, travel tracking apps","People":"Travelers, holiday celebrants, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate case identification, containment, and resource allocation","Impact":"Inefficient response to disease outbreaks, leading to uncontrolled spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement proactive testing, integrate health and immigration databases, utilize big data analytics for real-time alerts and tracking","Technologies":"National health insurance database, immigration and customs database integration, big data analytics, QR code scanning, online reporting systems","People":"Healthcare workers, public health officials, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, healthcare organizations"}]}
